actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 relating to the Little Calumet River, Illinois.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to require that the Little Calumet River channel in Illinois be maintained free of trees, roots, silt, debris, and objects. Requires that non-Federal interests pay 25 percent of such maintenance cost.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 relating to the Little Calumet River, Illinois.
